body_html:
Do we have a function telling you (easily) whether there is a GPU?
On Thu, Jun 9, 2016 at 08:11 Geoffrey Irving notifications@github.com
wrote:

@martinwicke https://github.com/martinwicke I'm not sure I understand.
You suggested that it might be as simple as
force_gpu=tf.test.is_built_with_cuda, which already exists. What is
missing?

—
